name: Full Remote Technical Inspection Checklist
description: Comprehensive remote inspection checklist for drone systems using still images from 8-camera cube setup

metadata.author: RemoteTI
metadata.assumptions: Batteries already swapped and charging. MedKit is mounted. No one enters hangar during RemoteTI. All 8 camera images must be clear and of good quality.

tasks.title: START CONDITIONS: Verify remote inspection prerequisites
tasks.description:
Confirm all prerequisites for remote inspection are met.

Verify you are operating RemoteTI (not on-site procedure).
Confirm correct hangar/Skybase ID is selected.
Verify all 8 camera still images are captured with good quality.
Confirm image quality is sufficient for accurate inspection.
Verify no people visible inside Skybase.
Document timestamp of inspection start.
instructions: Confirm RemoteTI procedure is being used
Check all 8 camera images are captured and clear
Verify image quality is good for all cameras
STOP if any image quality is poor or condition not confirmed

tasks.title: CAMERA COVERAGE: Verify adequate visual coverage
tasks.description:
Confirm critical areas are visible in captured still images from 8 cube corner cameras.

Drone visible from at least 2 opposite corners.
Marker alignment visible from at least 1 low-angle view.
Umbilical connection area visible from at least 1 close/side view.
MedKit and winch line path visible from at least 1 front/side view.
Ground/enclosure visible for debris check from minimum 2 corners.
instructions: Verify drone visibility from opposite corners
STOP if critical areas not visible

tasks.title: SKYBASE SAFETY: Environment and obstacle check
tasks.description:
Inspect Skybase environment for safety hazards in still images.

No debris, tools, or loose objects on Skybase floor.
No cables or objects near propellers/landing gear.
Visual navigation marker clean and unobstructed.
Enclosure vegetation does not pose takeoff/landing risk.
Skybase lights visible and functional.
Low-pressure pins aligned with loops (door safety).
instructions: Scan floor for debris/tools in images
Verify marker is clean and visible

tasks.title: DRONE STATUS: Verify remote safe state
tasks.description:
Confirm drone is in expected safe state in still images.

Drone stationary and stable on landing gear.
Nav lights showing expected pattern:
- Green = OK
- Blue = OK with MedKit mounted
- Red/unexpected = STOP and contact pilot

Drone appears level and properly positioned.
instructions: Verify drone stability on landing gear
STOP if red lights or unexpected pattern

tasks.title: UMBILICAL: Power connection and contact surfaces
tasks.description:
Inspect umbilical connection and contact surfaces in still images.

Umbilical connected and appears straight (no crooked seating).
No visible arcing residue, soot, or corrosion on contacts.
Drone sits correctly on contact surfaces (no odd offset).
Cable routing appears correct without strain.

tasks.title: PARACHUTE SYSTEM: Complete PRS inspection
tasks.description:
Inspect entire parachute recovery system in still images.

Yellow lid seated evenly with no gaps.
No cracks visible on lid perimeter.
No parachute fabric protruding outside lid.
Parachute tube seated correctly with no looseness.
Line/collector appears intact with no excessive slack.
Fuse switch intact with red cap present.
instructions: Check yellow lid seating and gaps
Verify fuse switch and red cap

tasks.title: DRONE STRUCTURE: Arms, core, and landing gear
tasks.description:
Inspect drone structural components in still images.

All motor arms intact (no cracks/bends/dents).
Core structure intact with no visible cracks.
Landing gear stable and symmetric.
No structural damage or deformation.
All components appear properly aligned.
instructions: Inspect each motor arm for damage

tasks.title: PROPULSION: Propellers, motors, and ESCs
tasks.description:
Inspect propulsion system components in still images.

All 8 propellers present and intact (no chips/cracks/deformation).
No contamination (ice/snow/mud) on propellers.
Propellers fully deployed in flight-ready position.
Motors intact with no visible rotor damage.
ESC-to-motor orange cables intact and routed correctly.
ESC modules appear mounted with no looseness.

tasks.title: ANTENNAS: 4G, GPS, and communication systems
tasks.description:
Inspect all antenna systems in still images.

4G Antennas: 4 antennas present and secured
- 2 pointing sideways
- 2 angled downward

GPS masts intact and aimed forward.
All antenna connections appear secure.
No damage to antenna elements.

tasks.title: SENSORS: Cameras and navigation sensors
tasks.description:
Inspect sensor systems in still images.

RealSense lenses clean and undamaged (front + downward).
OpticalFlow area unobstructed (no dirt blocking).
Rangefinder lens clean and properly mounted.
All sensors appear properly aligned.
No physical damage to sensor housings.

tasks.title: PORTS & CAPS: Verify all protective covers
tasks.description:
Verify all ports have protective caps in still images.

Ethernet cap installed and seated properly.
USB cap installed and seated properly.
All other port covers in place.
No exposed connectors visible.
Caps show no damage or loose fitting.

tasks.title: PERIPHERALS: Lights, MiniFinder, and accessories
tasks.description:
Inspect peripheral equipment in still images.

Downlight mounted on front-right landing gear.
Downlight not illuminated during inspection.
MiniFinder present and mounted correctly.
All peripheral mounting appears secure.
No loose or missing accessories.

tasks.title: MARKINGS: Regulatory and identification markings
tasks.description:
Verify all required markings visible in still images.

Permit number visible on rear arm ('SWEbne...').
Onyx name and airframeID visible and correct.
Public 'found drone' instructions visible.
AED alarm device sticker with power-off instructions.
All markings legible and undamaged.
instructions: Locate permit number on rear arm

tasks.title: MEDKIT & WINCH: Payload system verification
tasks.description:
Verify MedKit and winch system in still images.

MedKit present and seated correctly.
MedKit appears mechanically locked (no misalignment).
Winch line routed through red guide below drone.
Line appears knot-free and not snagged.
Line tension normal (no loose loops on floor).
AED device visible and properly mounted.

tasks.title: WASP: Attachment and carbon fiber inspection
tasks.description:
Inspect WASP system attachment in still images.

All four WASP mounting points secure.
Carbon fiber panels intact (no cracks/delamination).
No visible damage to WASP structure.
All WASP connections appear secure.
Proper alignment with drone core.

tasks.title: BATTERY AREA: Compartment and lid inspection
tasks.description:
Inspect battery compartment area in still images.

Battery compartment lid completely closed.
All latches appear engaged.
No gaps visible around lid edges.
Ventilation openings unobstructed.
No damage to lid or seals.

tasks.title: ALIGNMENT: Marker precision and positioning
tasks.description:
Verify drone alignment with navigation marker in still images.

Drone centered on visual navigation marker.
Drone body parallel with marker lines.
Landing legs symmetric relative to marker.
Front direction matches marker orientation.
Proper clearance from all hangar structures.

tasks.title: CABLES: Visible wiring and connections
tasks.description:
Inspect all visible cables and connectors in still images.

No damaged cable shielding visible.
No exposed conductive material.
All connectors appear properly seated.
Cable routing appears organized.
No loose or dangling wires.

tasks.title: FINAL CHECK: Go/No-Go decision
tasks.description:
Perform final comprehensive assessment for go/no-go decision.

Skybase area clean and safe.
Marker clean and alignment correct.
Umbilical connection verified.
Drone external condition acceptable.
All systems appear nominal.
No unverified critical items.

tasks.title: DOCUMENTATION: Complete inspection records
tasks.description:
Complete inspection documentation and reporting.

Log RemoteTI completion in work order.
Format: Name, Hangar, Timestamp, RemoteTI PASS/STOP + comment.
Example: 'Oliver Wallin, Kung√§lv, 2026-01-17 10:42, RemoteTI PASS'

If abnormalities found, fill Adverse Events form:
https://forms.gle/NF1nVe6F9GGWq5fZ8
